T02TD3082E:177a-0: @177a ` // gtsug tor dri med kyi gzungs chog bzhugs//
T02TD3082E:177a-3: gtsug tor dri ma med pa'i gzungs kyi cho ga /
T02TD3082E:177a-4: dang por ba'i lcib sa la ma lhung bas dkyil 'khor gru bzhi pa byas la /
T02TD3082E:177a-5: de la tsandan dang gur kum la sogs pas gtor la /
T02TD3082E:177a-6: me tog sil ma'ang gtor ro //
T02TD3082E:177a-7: de'i steng du gtsug tor dri ma med pa'i yang snying gur kum mam /
T02TD3082E:177a-8: gi wam gis me tog dkar po 'byung ba'i myu gus gro ga la bris /
T02TD3082E:177a-9: de la dkyil 'khor du bcug pa'i sv'atstsha lnga'am /
T02TD3082E:177b-0: bdun nam dgu @177b tsam byas la /
T02TD3082E:177b-1: mandal gyi me tog phung po'i steng du gzhag / de nas mchod rten re re la lha bshos la sogs pa mchod pa rnam pa lnga re re bshams la /
T02TD3082E:177b-2: mandal gyi steng du bskor ba ltar gzhag / yang mandal gyi steng du gser dngul la sogs pa rin po che'i bum pa bzhi tsam dang /
T02TD3082E:177b-3: skyogs la sogs pa'i snod bzhi tsam aa ka ru dang tu ruska la sogs pa dri bzang pos bkang la /
T02TD3082E:177b-4: phyogs mtshams rnams su gzhag go //
T02TD3082E:177b-5: de nas mchod pa bshams pa rnams sku gzugs dang s'atstsha la sogs pa dkon mchog la 'bul zhing /
T02TD3082E:177b-6: bsod nams kyi yan lag rnams tshang bar bya /
T02TD3082E:177b-7: de nas mchod g-yog gcig bdag gis bzlas brjod ma zin gyi bar du aa ka ru la sogs pa'i spos dri zhim po bsreg du gzhug / bzlas pa'i dus su gtam gzhan dang ma 'dres par bya /
T02TD3082E:177b-8: bzlas pa zin pa dang yang snying po 'ba' zhig bzlas shing bskor ba brgya rtsa brgyad bya /
T02TD3082E:177b-10: rin po che'i snod rnams kyi chu kun las cung zad bsdus la /
T02TD3082E:177b-11: nad pa la cung zad blud cing khrus bya /
T02TD3082E:177b-12: de ltar byas na glo bur ba la sogs pa'i nad tshabs che ba las kyang thar bar 'gyur ro //
T02TD3082E:177b-13: tshe zad pa las ring du 'tsho bar 'gyur ro //
T02TD3082E:177b-14: las kyi sgrib pa chen po rnams kyang byang bar 'gyur te /
T02TD3082E:177b-15: de dag la sogs pa phan yon dpag tu med pa ni de nyid kyi cho ga rgya chen po las shes par bya'o //
T02TD3082E:177b-16: cho ga gang byed kyang 'byung po thams cad pa'i gtor ma gsum mam bzhi gtung bar bya'o //
T02TD3082E:177b-17: slob dpon dpal mar me mdzad ye shes kyis mdzad pa'i gtsug tor dri ma med pa'i gzungs kyi cho ga rdzogs so//
